FAQ.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.description: Quick answers to common questions me and my work. Open any question to learn more.

item1.question: What services do you offer?
item1.answer: I offer a range of web development services including custom website design, full-stack application development, performance optimization, and SEO enhancements.

item2.question: How long does it take to build a website?
item2.answer: The timeline depends on the complexity of the project. A simple portfolio site might take 1-2 weeks, while a full-featured web application could take 4-8 weeks or more.

item3.question: Do you provide ongoing support?
item3.answer: Yes, I offer maintenance packages to ensure your website remains secure, up-to-date, and performing optimally after launch.

item4.question: What is your pricing structure?
item4.answer: Pricing varies based on project scope and requirements. Feel free to contact me for a detailed quote tailored to your specific needs.

item5.question: What payment methods do you accept?
item5.answer: For now, I accept payments through PayPal, Orange Money, and MTN Mobile Money.

item6.question: Can you handle hosting?
item6.answer: Yeah, I can handle buying the domain name and put your website online.
